"A.P.241/12/8": "Doot doot doo, doo-doo-doot do-doo~."
"You're in awfully high spirits, Xiera. Has something good happened to you?"
"Nothing at all. I'm not the one I'm happy for, Alma."
"Hm?"
"Pardon me."
"This is quite the prestigious greeting party, for a summons from the Administrator."
"<%me>, Matoi. ...Even Xiao is present."
"It's just a small inconvenience."
"And, Xiera. What business did you need me to be here in person for?"
"Ahh, umm... It's already been resolved, now that we have you here..."
"Right, <%me>?"
"Well, reuniting with old friends is a fine thing. <%me>. I'm glad to see you're doing well."
"You're not overworking yourself either, are you, Matoi? Sara has brought up both of your recklessness at the Commander meetings."
"Ahaha... I've been paying closer attention to my health these days. Have you been well, Regius?"

"Yes, I've been whiling my days away teaching.
It's quite peaceful and pleasant."
"Re-Regius! I'd like to hear some of your stories about the past, please!"
"...What's this out of the blue, Xiera? Aren't you able to find anything you're curious about in the activity records archive?"
"Uhh, ahh... Umm, well you see, it's not like that...!"
"You see, Regius... She might not be visible, but right now, right here, Al-..."
"Don't!"
"Don't tell him about me. ...Please."
"Ah! W-Wait! I'm sorry Regius! Have a good day!"
"What was that about, Xiao?"
"...A lot of things weren't made clear forty years ago, so you're probably not at fault here."
